oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pescarol, Moshe ben Avraham
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bible. O.T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Illuminated scroll, earliest known example of an Italian illustrated Magillah. This section shows three panels, the first shows five men walking, holding paper. The second shows a King sat on a throne with the Queen kneeling at the bottom. Two men stand on the right, and four women on left. The third panel shows a man lying in bed, with a bucket at the bedside. Two men are standing at the foot of bed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail of Esther scroll
